news_header: This article discusses three breakout stocks: Bridgewater Bancshares, Eastern Bankshares, and BrainsWay, highlighting their potential for growth and investment strategies.
news_original_title: Zacks.com featured highlights include Bridgewater  Bancshares, Eastern Bankshares and BrainsWay
news_text: The article identifies Bridgewater Bancshares, Eastern Bankshares, and BrainsWay as breakout stocks for investors. It explains the strategy of selecting stocks based on support and resistance levels, emphasizing the importance of timing in buying breakout candidates. The expected earnings growth rates for these companies are 31.4%, 40.6%, and 130.8%, respectively. The article encourages readers to use the Research Wizard for further investment insights and strategies.
